title: go.tools/present: @ symbol not supported in title slides
body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?

Start a go.talks slide deck. On the title slide, put a line containing an @ symbol, such
as a twitter handle or email address.


What is the expected output? What do you see instead?

Want: Twitter handle or email address displayed.
Have: The line containing the @ symbol is not displayed, nor is any line after it on the
title slide.


Please use labels and text to provide additional information.

Reproduced as of go.talks / go.tools tip, Jan 19, 2014. According to the docs, looks
like using the @ symbol ought to be supported.
